AzureBlobSasConfiguration.description: Specifies the shared access signature (SAS) that DataSync uses to access your Azure Blob Storage container.

properties.name: AzureBlobSasToken
properties.description: Specifies the shared access signature (SAS) token, which indicates the permissions DataSync needs to access your Azure Blob Storage container.

type.description: Specifies the shared access signature (SAS) token, which indicates the permissions DataSync needs to access your Azure Blob Storage container.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: AgentArns
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of agents to use for an Azure Blob Location.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of agents to use for an Azure Blob Location.

properties.name: AzureAccessTier
properties.description: Specifies an access tier for the objects you're transferring into your Azure Blob Storage container.

type.description: Specifies an access tier for the objects you're transferring into your Azure Blob Storage container.

properties.name: AzureBlobAuthenticationType
properties.description: The specific authentication type that you want DataSync to use to access your Azure Blob Container.

type.description: The specific authentication type that you want DataSync to use to access your Azure Blob Container.

properties.name: AzureBlobContainerUrl
properties.description: The URL of the Azure Blob container that was described.

type.description: The URL of the Azure Blob container that was described.

properties.name: AzureBlobType
properties.description: Specifies a blob type for the objects you're transferring into your Azure Blob Storage container.

type.description: Specifies a blob type for the objects you're transferring into your Azure Blob Storage container.

properties.name: Subdirectory
properties.description: The subdirectory in the Azure Blob Container that is used to read data from the Azure Blob Source Location.

type.description: The subdirectory in the Azure Blob Container that is used to read data from the Azure Blob Source Location.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: LocationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Azure Blob Location that is created.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Azure Blob Location that is created.

properties.name: LocationUri
properties.description: The URL of the Azure Blob Location that was described.

type.description: The URL of the Azure Blob Location that was described.
